title: High DPI Support
author: donebydavid
body_snippet:
Apparently #1107 was merged to fix issues with High DPI support as mentioned in ticket #321.  On v1.77.1.27654 this issue is still occurring where by the mRemote interface scales fine, but the remote connection does not.

## Expected Behavior
Remote session to scale correctly

## Current Behaviour
Remote session does not scale

comments.snippet: Same issue. My laptop is 4K screen. Changed to high resolution and scaled 125%. mRemoteNG interface is fine scaled. But Windows remote desktop inside mRemoteNG is not scaled properly.
comments.author: wilber82

comments.snippet: Same issue. When I use mstsc.exe the remote desktop ist scaled to 125% (like the Host) too. In mRemoteNG the Scalingfactor ist always set to 100%.
comments.author: znbrain

comments.snippet: Would be nice if mRemoteNG can use the same scaling factor as the client environment.
comments.author: changbowen
